rows.label: qev070302_MSG0001
rows.name:
...Well? Did you find anybody or any body that looks
remotely like Professor B out there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0008
rows.name:
Yeesh... Doesn't Professor B know that Sylvalum is no
place to go wandering off?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hey, there's a a green panel inside the Miramobile.
Could you push it for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Veven that you will not press such
an obviously suspicious button.

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0004
rows.name:
What is this, your rebellious phase? Just feel like saying
no at random? Just push the button already...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0005
rows.name: ...See? The professor's location popped up, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0006
rows.name: He might be caught up in in trouble again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070302_MSG0007
rows.name:
I'd appreciate if you could hurry to his position and
bring him back ASAP, okay?[ST:wait ]
